japanese: （観覧車に乗り込む頃には、日が傾き始めていた）
translation:
(When we got on the Ferris wheel,
 the sun had already started to set.)

japanese: （係員に見送られ、ゴンドラがゆっくり上昇を始める）
translation:
(As we were waved off by the attendant,
 the gondola slowly began to rise up.)

japanese:
（窓の外には、街並みの向こうに
　太陽光を反射して輝く黄金色の海が広がっていく）
translation:
(Outside the window, beyond the cityscape,
 the golden sea sparkled, reflecting the sunlight.)

japanese:
（だが、そんな絶景を楽しむ余裕は
　俺にも、二乃にもなかった）
translation:
(But neither I nor Nino
 had the luxury of enjoying such a breathtaking view.)

japanese:
じゃ、まず私から話すわ。
そのほうがいいでしょ？
translation:
Okay, let me go first.
It's better that way, right?

japanese: ……わかった。
translation: I understand.

japanese:
単刀直入に聞くわね。
今日、ううん、昨日の午後くらいから
風太郎の様子がおかしかったけど――
translation:
I'll just ask you directly.
Since today... No, wait... Yesterday afternoon, right?
Your behavior has been strange, Futaro, but%p-2;――

japanese: それって私のせい？
translation: Is that because of me?

japanese:
はっ！？
いや二乃のせいって、なんでそうなったんだよ。
translation:
WHA%p-2;――%p;?!
No, why would it be because of you?

japanese: なんでって――
translation: Why, you say%p-2;――

japanese:
こっちこそなんでって言いたいわよ！
風太郎の様子がおかしくなるなら
私のせいに決まってるでしょ！
translation:
Why's what I want to ask you!
I mean, if your behavior is weird, Futaro,
then it's definitely because of me!

japanese:
私だって、そうなるに決まってるんだからっ！
他の理由なんてあるわけないわ！
translation:
That's totally
why you would become like that!
There's no other reason!

japanese: お、おう……。
translation: W-wait...

japanese: あと、私にも心当たりがあるのよ。
translation: And, there's something I realized too.

japanese: え？　心当たりって――
translation: Huh? Something you realized%p-2;――

japanese:
先に私の話を聞いてくれるんでしょ。
ほら、答えて。
どうして変だったのよ。
translation:
We're gonna finish my part of the talk first, okay?
Come on, answer me.
Why were you acting weird?

japanese: それは……。
translation: Oh, that...

japanese:
（ここで正直に話すのは情けない。
　が、二乃に隠せる気もしないし――）
translation:
(It's so pathetic to speak honestly here. 
 But I can't hide it from Nino%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
（なにより、ここで誤魔化していいとは思えない。
　俺たちのこれからのために）
translation:
(More than anything, I can't deceive her here.
 For the sake of our future.)

japanese:
（結果としてまた二乃に甘えている状況ではあるが、
　俺のプライドなんて、二乃との未来に比べたら
　どうでもいい！）
translation:
(In the end, I find myself relying on Nino once again,
 but compared to our future together,
 my pride doesn't matter at all!)

japanese: ……俺は、お前に相応しいか？
translation: Am I suitable for you?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
お前は、俺にはもったいないくらいに……
その、すごく……魅力的、だと思う。
この旅行で改めてそう思った。
translation:
I think you're incredibly...attractive,
to the point where I feel...unworthy of you.
I realized that during this trip.

japanese:
そういうお前が、
なんでこんなまともに恋愛もできない俺に……
告白してくれたのかがわからない。
translation:
I don't understand why someone like you
would confess to someone like me...who
can't even handle romantic relationships properly.

japanese:
だから、情けない話だが、いつかこの先
お前が俺に愛想を尽かしてしまうんじゃないかと
思って……。
translation:
So, to be pathetically honest,
I was worried that one day
you'd get tired of me...

japanese:
お前に見直してもらうというか、男を見せたくてだな、
色々とやってみようとしてたんだ。
translation:
I wanted you to see me
in a new light,
to show you the kind of man I am.

japanese: まあ、全部失敗しちまったんだが……。
translation: But, everything I tried ended in failure...

japanese: はあ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese:
呆れたわ！
そんなことで悩んでたなんて。
translation:
You're ridiculous!
You were worrying about something like that?

japanese:
お、おい二乃！？
近い……！
translation:
H-hey, Nino?!
You're so close...!

japanese:
あのね、風太郎。
そもそも気持ちなんて変わるものよ。
translation:
Listen, Futaro.
Feelings are something that can change.

japanese:
は？
ど、どういうことだ？
translation:
Huh?
Wh-what do you mean?

japanese:
（まさか、もう愛想をつかしてるとか？
　ここに誘ったのは別れ話をするためなのか！？）
translation:
(Is she already tired of me?
 Did she invite me here to break up with me?!)

japanese:
思い出して。
風太郎と初めて会った頃のこと。
translation:
Think back
to when we first met.

japanese: 私、あんたに散々な態度を取ってきたわよね。
translation: I've given you a hard time since then, haven't I?

japanese:
……忘れたくても忘れられねぇよ。
なかなかのものだったし。
translation:
I can't forget that, even if I wanted to.
You were quite something.

japanese:
あれだけ嫌っていたあんたに告白するくらいに、
私の気持ちは変わった。
translation:
My feelings have changed enough to confess
to someone I used to hate so much.

japanese:
人の気持ちなんて変わるって思ったほうがいいわ。
むしろ変わらないことなんてないのよ。
translation:
It's better to think that people's feelings can change. 
In fact, there's nothing that doesn't change.

japanese: っ！

ま、例外で、いまの風太郎への気持ちは
絶対に変わらないけどね。
translation:
Well, there's an exception.
My feelings towards you, Futaro, will never change.

japanese:
私のこの想いは、風太郎っていう存在が
変えて導いてくれた先の気持ちなんだもの。
translation:
My feelings for you are the result of the changes
and guidance that you have brought to my life.

japanese:
裏を返せば、それ以外の気持ちは
変わるかもしれないってことなんだけど。
translation:
On the other hand,
there might be other feelings that could change.

japanese:
だから、不安なのは私だって一緒だわ。
風太郎だけじゃない。
translation:
That's why I'm also anxious.
It's not just you, Futaro.

japanese: やっぱり不安にさせてたのか？
translation: Did I make you anxious after all?

japanese:
不安になったっていうか、
風太郎の彼女になったらついてまわるような感情よ。
translation:
I wouldn't say anxious, but more like emotions
that would come with being your girlfriend.

japanese:
あのね？
風太郎だって、すごく魅力的な人なのよ？
ただ伝わりにくいだけ。
translation:
Hey, you know what, Futaro?
You're a really attractive person for me,
you know? Just hard to read.

japanese:
伝わってしまえば、
あっという間に好きになってしまうの。
translation:
Once I understood you,
I fell in love with you in no time.

japanese:
いまだって三玖や一花がいるのに、
風太郎が東京へ行ったら
どれだけライバルが増えるかわからない。
translation:
Even though Miku and Ichika are still around,
I don't know how many more rivals there'll be
if you go to Tokyo.

japanese:
だから、いつも心配してるのよ？
誰かに風太郎を取られるんじゃないかって。
translation:
That's why I'm always worried, you know?
That someone might take you away from me, Futaro.

japanese:
い、いや、さすがにそれは買いかぶりだろ。
俺はそんな人間じゃねぇよ。
translation:
N-no way, isn't that a bit of a stretch?
I'm not that kind of person.

japanese: 自覚がないのも困ったものね。
translation: It's an issue that you don't even realize.

japanese:
あんたみたいな男を好きになるなんて、
地球上に私１人と思ったのは、大間違いだったわ。
translation:
Thinking I was the only one on this earth
who would fall in love with a guy like you
was a big mistake.

japanese:
でも、だからこそ、
告白されたとか告白したことで安心なんかしない。
translation:
But that's why I can't be at ease even
if you confess to me or I confess to you.

japanese:
私はずっと攻めていくんだから、
あんたもずっと私を攻めなさい。
不安になってる暇なんかないわよ？
translation:
I'll always be the one making the moves,
so you should keep making moves on me too.
There's no time to be anxious, you know?

japanese: 二乃……。
translation: Nino...

japanese:
（そうだ。
　これが二乃なんだ）
translation:
(That's right.
 This is Nino.)

japanese:
（いつだって俺にはない考えを示し、
　新しい世界を見せてくれる）
translation:
(She always shows me new ideas and
 shows me a new world.)

japanese:
（それだけじゃない。
　気付いてみれば当たり前のことにだって
　ちゃんと目を向かせてくれる）
translation:
(And it's not just that.
 Even for things that seem obvious,
 she makes me pay attention to them.)

japanese: （そういう二乃だからこそ、俺は……）
translation: (Because Nino is like that, I...)

japanese: なあ、二乃。
translation: Hey, Nino.

japanese: なに？
translation: What?

japanese: あの時、俺の願いを聞いてくれて、ありがとな。
translation: Thanks for fulfilling my wish back then.

japanese: 願いって……。
translation: Your wish...

japanese: お前と……新しい世界を見ていきたいって。
translation: That...I want to discover a new world with you.

japanese:
風太郎も、私とずっと一緒にいようと
頑張ってくれたのよね。
ありがと。
translation:
You've also done your best to stay with me
for as long as possible.
Thank you.

japanese: そして、これからもよろしく。
translation:
And, I'm excited for our relationship
from here on out.

japanese: こっちこそ。
translation: Me too.

japanese:
やっぱり、こうしてちゃんと話すのって大切ね。
恋人同士って関係に甘えちゃダメだわ。
translation:
You know,
it's important to have conversations like this.
We can't rely on just being in a romantic relationship.

japanese:
まったくだな。
お互いが他人だってことは自覚しとかねぇと。
translation:
I agree.
We need to be aware that we are separate individuals.

japanese: でも、以心伝心の仲にはなれるでしょ？
translation:
But we can get to the point where we can communicate
without words, right?

japanese:
私たちは別の人間だけど、
お互い歩み寄ることで
相手の気持ちに気付くことができる。
translation:
Even though we are different individuals,
compromising with each other,
we can understand each other's feelings.

japanese:
いまの私の気持ち、わかる？
わからなかったら聞いて。
聞いてくれたら答えるから。
translation:
Do you understand how I feel right now?
If you don't, please ask me.
I will answer if you ask.

japanese: 二乃……。
translation: Nino...

japanese:
勉強になった。
恋愛については、まだまだ勉強することだらけだ。
translation:
I've learned a lot.
There's still so much I've got to pick up
when it comes to love.

japanese:
私だってそう。
これから先、ずっと２人で
ステップアップしていきましょ。
translation:
I'm in the same boat as you.
Let's take the next step together,
just the two of us, forever.

japanese:
１人じゃわからないことでも
２人で挑めば答えは見つかるわ、きっと。
ああ、そうだな。
translation: Ah, you're right.

japanese: だな、おかげで惚れ直したし。
translation: Yeah. I've fallen in love again because of it.

japanese: えっ。
translation: Um.

japanese: あっ、いや、その、いまのは……。
translation: Aah, no, um, just now was...

japanese: そんな風に思ってくれたの？
translation: That's how you were thinking?

japanese: ……そ、そうだよ！
translation: Th-that's right!

japanese:
お前はいつも、
俺を引っ張っていってくれるっつーか……。
translation:
You always lead me, show me the way,
something like that...

japanese:
だから、振りほどかれないように
必死でしがみついていく。
余裕がなくて……カッコ悪くてもな。
translation:
That's why I cling on so desperately to you, Nino,
so that I won't lose you.
Even if I can't handle it...and it's uncool.

japanese: 風太郎……。
translation: Futaro...

japanese:
ねえ、風太郎。
これからどうする？
みんな、もうここに来てるかもしれないけど。
translation:
Hey, Futaro.
What do we do from now on?
Everyone might be here already.

japanese: まだ２人だけで……ていうのはダメ？
translation: Can't we...be alone a little longer?

japanese:
……そうだな。
もう少しくらいなら、いいかもな。
translation:
Yeah.
I guess it's okay for a little.

japanese:
ふふっ！
いっそ、２人でどこかに行っちゃうなんてどう？
translation:
Teehee!
How about we go somewhere, just the two of us?

japanese:
さすがにそれはまずいだろ。
心配させちまう。
translation:
That's not a good idea.
We would worry everyone.

japanese:
そうね、残念だけど
あの子達を困らせるのはなしだわ。
translation:
Yeah, that's true.
It's a shame though.

japanese: でも……。
translation: But...

japanese:
ねえ、風太郎。
さっき私、言ったわよね。
心当たりがあるって。
translation:
Hey, Futaro. I said it earlier, right?
That I realized something.

japanese:
ああ、それだ。
俺も聞きたかったんだよ。
なんだ、心当たりって。
translation:
Oh, that.
I wanted to hear about that, too.
What is it that you realized?

japanese: 私、風太郎を困らせてたんじゃないかしら？
translation: Didn't I bother you, Futaro?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
夜、急に部屋に行ったりしたでしょ？
そういうの、風太郎には迷惑だったんじゃないかって。
translation:
I went to your room at night, right, Futaro?
I wondered if that caused you some trouble.

japanese: でも私、思い出を作りたかった。
translation: But, I wanted to make some memories.

japanese:
風太郎が上京してしまう。
いつも一緒にはいられなくなってしまう。
だから……私なりに、攻めてみたのよ。
translation:
You're going to Tokyo, Futaro.
We won't be able to be together all the time anymore.
So...in my own way, I decided to make a move on you.

japanese:
でも、風太郎はそんなこと思ってなくて、
困らせただけなんじゃないかって。
translation:
But if you didn't feel that way,
I might have just bothered you.

japanese:
いや、迷惑だなんてことはないぞ。
困りもして、いや、まあ、ある意味では困ったが、
困ってないつーか……。
translation:
No, you didn't cause me any trouble.
It was a bit difficult, well, in a sense it was
a bit troubling, but not really... I guess.

japanese: 俺も、お前との思い出が欲しいと思ってる。
translation: I also want to have memories with you.

japanese: そうなのね、良かった。
translation: Is that so? How nice.

japanese: だったら……ここで……。
translation: Then...right here...

japanese: （これはもしかして……二乃もなのか？）
translation: (Does Nino...maybe want to do it too?)

japanese: 風太郎……。
translation: Futaro...

japanese:
（ここなら誰も見てない、誰の邪魔も入らない。
　二乃とキスを……！）
translation:
(Here, no one is watching, no one is bothering us.
 I can kiss Nino...!)

japanese: きゃあっ！？
translation: EEEEP!

japanese: うわっ！
translation: UWAA!

japanese:
あ、あら？
もう１周しちゃったのね、降りなくちゃ。
translation:
O-oh my?
It looks like we've already completed one round,
we need to get off.

japanese:
そ、そうだな。
あっという間だったなぁ、ははは……。
translation:
Y-yeah.
It went by in a flash, hahaha...

japanese:
（くっ、いい雰囲気だったのに！
　観覧車め、もうちょっとゆっくり回れよ！！）
translation:
(Oh come ON, the mood was just getting good!
 Can't this Ferris wheel go a little slower?!?!)
